_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: GTNH
author: aa.rayner@outlook.com
description: You are looking at a big progressive kitchensink pack for Minecraft 1.7.10 balanced around the mod GregTech. Over 9 years of developement (and still going) have formed a balance and refinement that only a handful of packs can keep up with. We are talking about thousands of recipe tweaks, a massive questbook with custom reward system, unique world generation, custom mods coded for the pack, custom Thauminomicon pages, and many more.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Forge Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

mkdir -p /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server

curl -sS http://downloads.gtnewhorizons.com/ServerPacks/GT_New_Horizons_${MODPACK_VERSION}_Server_Java_17-21.zip -o GT_New_Horizons_${MODPACK_VERSION}_Server_Java_17-21.zip

unzip -o GT_New_Horizons_${MODPACK_VERSION}_Server_Java_17-21.zip

rm -rf GT_New_Horizons_${MODPACK_VERSION}_Server_Java_17-21.zip

rm startserver-java9.bat

rm startserver-java9.sh


if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/minecraft/java/server.properties
fi

echo "eula=true" > eula.txt

echo "done"

variables.name: Modpack Version
variables.description: Version of the modpack to use
